statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 3
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating > 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, feedback_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_rating = 1 OR feedback_rating = 5
SELECT AVG(feedback_rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123 AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY feedback_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM retention_strategies ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_description FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 456;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM retention_strategies WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM retention_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;

SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_data ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_data WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date, success_metrics FROM retention_strategies;

SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_data WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND implementation_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT strategy_name, implementation_date FROM retention_strategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT engagement_date, engagement_type FROM customer_engagement WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY engagement_date ASC;

SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id > 5 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, registration_date FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, comment FROM feedback_data JOIN feedback_ratings ON feedback_data.feedback_id = feedback_ratings.feedback_id WHERE rating >= 4;

SELECT customer_name, engagement_date, engagement_type FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_engagement ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_engagement.customer_id WHERE engagement_type = 'Email' ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
